channel.title: Sequenz doesn't load in c1a3a
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm stuck at c1a3a. I entered the air shaft but when I exit it the soldiers are not talking or moving. I kill them and head to the scientist where I can find the shotgun. He turns to me but doesn't start talking.
I replayed the whole chapter, I reinstalled the game, .... I don't know what to do.
Can you help?
[code] Loading game from //MOD/SAVE/bm_c1a3a.HL1... npc_maker v_01_m_p has no specified NPC-to-spawn classname. npc_maker v_02_m_p has no specified NPC-to-spawn classname. Error! Flag "$halflambert" is multiply defined in material "models/props_construction/light_floodlight01_on"! Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Scene 'scenes\Expressions\colleague_scared_idle_01.vcd' missing! Scene 'scenes\Expressions\colleague_normal_idle_01.vcd' missing! Redownloading all lightmaps Scene 'scenes\c1a3a\twelve_dumbass.vcd' missing! Late precache of models/humans/props/scientist_syringe.mdl Scene 'scenes\c1a3a\sci02_blastpitaccess_main01.vcd' missing! [/code]

item.title: Sequenz doesn't load in c1a3a
item.dc:creator: codmaster
item.description:
I redownloaded it via website linked here (not torrent) and I have the same issue. I deleted the BMS folder in sourcemods and reinstalled. Strangely when I loaded the game for the first time the save games where like 2 months old. I changed the video settings and when it startet again it had my latest save games in it. I loaded the save game till this point but the sequenzes didn’t start again… Any suggestions?

It’s funny how people freak out because of silly names and furthermore silly games. This is my nickname since 10 years and I wouldn’t change it because I switched to another game. People know me by that name. Seriously what’s the matter? It could have ment everything. Like the initials of a local sports club or what ever. People need to calm down…

Read full topic

item.title: Sequenz doesn't load in c1a3a
item.dc:creator: MSKyuuni
item.description:
TehBoxNoob:

Never put CoD in your name on a community dedicated to another game series.Anyhow like said by Crypt, your files are missing.Try downloading from another mirror.

Especially an FPS. I’d tell you this should be in Bug Reporting, but yeah, corrupt files, redownload.

Read full topic

item.title: Sequenz doesn't load in c1a3a

item.description:

item.title: Sequenz doesn't load in c1a3a
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Before I went by Crypt I used Cod as in the fish. Glad I switched, for obvious reasons.

On-topic, As Jack said, it’s almost guaranteed your files are corrupt. It said the choreo files are missing.

Read full topic

item.title: Sequenz doesn't load in c1a3a
item.dc:creator: codmaster
item.description:
Jack Freeman:

I don’t like your name.

In all seriousness, I think you have a corrupt download.

Oh sweet, that’s a warm welcome.

I downloaded it via torrent using the torrent from this site. I will try regular download and then install it again.

PS: This username was created when COD1 was out which is still a good game. But I have not played any COD online after laying COD1 to the side. By now I switched to BF3. Is that any better?

Read full topic

Hi,

I’m stuck at c1a3a. I entered the air shaft but when I exit it the soldiers are not talking or moving. I kill them and head to the scientist where I can find the shotgun. He turns to me but doesn’t start talking.

I replayed the whole chapter, I reinstalled the game, … I don’t know what to do.
